definition: reasonably priced/inexpensive/to keep prices down/(currency exchange) parity
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

sentences.english: You can adjust for that by using made-up conversion rates known as Purchasing Power Parities , or PPPs.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用取得的转换率，即购买力平价对其进行调整。

sentences.english: The gold standard failed to outlast the Depression.
sentences.chinese: 金平价未能在经济萧条时期得已持续。

sentences.english: The new standardwas set according to what economists call purchasing power parity.
sentences.chinese: 新的标准是根据经济学家所说的购买力平价而设定的。

sentences.english: A recursive method has been proposed to calculate the pair mortgage - rate.
sentences.chinese: 采用迭代方法给出了选定信用差水平下的平价抵押率。

sentences.english: Currently the world economy is $74 trillion on a purchasing power parity basis.the
sentences.chinese: 目前世界经济按购买力平价计算为74万亿美元。

sentences.english: That session is called Potty Parity.
sentences.chinese: 这届会议是所谓的厕所平价。

sentences.english: Men and women lined up at the Fair Price Shop in the village of Ban.
sentences.chinese: 在坂村，男女老少在国营平价粮店外排队等候着。

sentences.english: Buy skin care products with it, parity referral Garnier.
sentences.chinese: 买点护肤品用吧，平价引荐卡尼尔。

sentences.english: But by parity of reasoning it falls upon Calvinism.
sentences.chinese: 但平价的推理，它落在加尔文。

sentences.english: The Interest Rate Parity theory is still the basic pricing- mechanism for forward exchange rate.
sentences.chinese: 远期汇率的基本定价机制仍然是利率平价理论。

sentences.english: The third column calculates Big Mac PPPs.
sentences.chinese: 第三列是巨无霸购买力平价。

sentences.english: The corruption is not limited to selling subsidized wheat flour on the black market.
sentences.chinese: 腐败现象不止是有人把平价面包拿到黑市上高价出售。

definition: open shelves (in self-service store or user access library)
in touch with the people/sensitive to people's needs
(Internet slang) to recommend a product to sb
